title: Looking for Support main
body: Looking for support main to play with support only duo queue silver gold plat or diamond leave a message or pm

replies.body: I'm b2 but I'm not b2 standard. I'm much higher but I'm stuck. If that counts?
Not to ruin yo day but if you b2 and you think you ain't meant to be there cause you are better then a b2 player, well you ain't sorry. that's why you haven't really climbed.

Someone who's better than the rank they are in and unable to climb dosen't necessarily mean they're bad nor their skills is truely set there. If you disregarded the fact that if he solo q then the bronze players he plays with won't play as well as a silver+ and possibly feed the enemies entire team and so he is unable to climb. There are other factors because listing them would be a pain.
Or people in ranked could be banning his main, or he might have just had a tilt streak and dropped from Silver 5? I have alot of friends who fluctuate every few weeks between Bronze 2 to Silver 5.

i recently tried to start climbing then i tried getting some adc's in duo que and i went straight back down to b5
im ok at positioning and landing skill shots not so good at decision making though
P5 support main! TCA Beausen is my main that got banned..... Beausen is my smurf.

How can you duo with people from silver-> diamond?

Multiple accounts?
